title: A bipolar-type covalent organic framework on carbon nanotubes with enhanced density of redox-active sites for high-performance lithium-ion batteries
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, 17,5451-5460
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE00520A, Paper
Qingmei Xu, Zhixin Liu, Yucheng Jin, Xiya Yang, Tingting Sun, Tianyu Zheng, Ning Li, Yuhui Wang, Tongxuan Li, Kang Wang, Jianzhuang Jiang
A COF has been successfully fabricated onto carbon nanotubes as a cathode in LIBs with a high energy density of 737.5 W h gâˆ’1, representing the highest one among the thus far reported LIB cathodes.
